news_detail: Maroof Muslim science daan al farabi ke halaat zindagi ka mutalea kya jaye to aik baat yeh bhi samnay aati hai ke woh 70 zubanain aur buliyan ravani se bol satke they. aayiyae jantay hain ke is mein kitni sadaqat hai?

abbu Nasar Mohammad al farabi aik numaya science daan they aur inhen” mualim sani” ka khitaab diya gaya. is se qabal Maroof falsafi Arastoo ko” mualim awwal” ka khitaab diya ja chuka hai. al farabi ne Arastoo ki talifaat, un ki sharah aur un par tbsron ke hawalay se khusoosi tavajja di. al farabi 260 hjri mein turkistan mein peda hue. un ke waalid fouj mein commander they. al farabi ne bukhari aur bghdad mein taleem haasil ki. is douran unhon ne zabaan, falsafah, moseeqi, tib aur reyaziat ke aloom ki Maarfat haasil ki. is cheez ne inhen jame al-aloom science daan bana diya. falsafay ke maidan mein un ki tahreerein baad mein aaye walay bohat se logon ke liye bunyadi plate form saabit huien. unhon ne ilmِ Ellahi ko falsafay se ilahada karne mein ahem kirdaar ada kya. moseeqi se shughaf ke hawalay se al farabi ne apni” kitaab Al Aghani” taleef ki. unhon ne moseeqi ke kayi alaat bhi ijaad kiye. woh apni dhunon se sun-nay walon ko ronay par majaboor kar dete they. al farabi ne kayi mulkon ka safar kya aur aakhir kaar 339 hjri mutabiq 950 hamza Dimashq mein 80 baras ki Umar mein un ki zindagi ka safar ekhtataam ko pouncha .
Ibn Khulkan aur zabanon ka qissah

Maroof moarakh Ibn Khulkan kehte hain ke al farabi 70 zabanon aur bolyon mein guftagu kar letay they. bohat se mohqiqeen ne is baat mein shak ka izhaar kya hai taham yeh Maroof hai ke woh Turkey, Farsi, Unani aur Arabi zabaan par uboor rakhtay they. Ibn Khulkan ne apni kitaab” wafiat al ayaan” mein al farabi ke Sultan Saif adolah ke darbaar mein pounchanay ke mauqa par mukhtasir maklmay ka zikar kya hai. is maklmay ke douran al farabi ne aik mauqa par Sultan ko jawab dete hue bataya ke woh 70 zabanon aur bolyon mein guftagu kar satke hain .

Ibn Khulkan ke nazdeek al farabi ne apni Umar ka aik hssh zabanon ko seekhnay par lagaya. is ke baad phir hikmat o Danish ke aloom ki janib mutwajjah hue. al farabi ne insani zindagi mein msrrt ke mafhuum par khusoosi tavajja markooz ki. unhon ne yonani falsafay, –apne zaati afkaar aur mukhtalif maqamat ke asfaar ki roshni mein is maidan mein apna aik nazriya qaim kya. al farabi ke nazdeek msrrt ki soch aqal, aagahi aur idraak ke sath marboot hai lehaza nawaqif aur kam ilm har gaz masroor nahi ho ga.
1.title: Muslim science daan jo” 70 zubanain” bol sakta tha?

news_detail: Dubai mein qaim Surriya Astronomy center ( markaz Alsuraya al falki ) shehrion mein khalaa  aur falkiat ke baarey mein aagahi aam karne ke liye koshan hai. is markaz ke director aur cheif executive husn Ahmed alhriri ka kehna hai ke log is markaz mein aa kar ilm alfalkiat ka tajurbah kar saktay hain aur bohat kuch seekh satke hain. unhon ny’ ‘ Al Arabia ‘ ‘ se guftagu karte hue kaha ke is markaz mein logon ko khalayi science ke baarey mein taleem di jati hai aur unhein is mazmoon mein mazeed tahaqeeq ke liye tayyar kya jata hai. yeh Dubai shehar mein mehez sitara shanasi ka markaz nahi hai balkay is ke so a bhi bohat kuch hai. alhriri ka kehna tha ke hamaray liye sirf yeh kaafi nahi ke kuch sekhen aur bhool jayen. hum yeh chahtay hain ke log sekhen aur is ko amli jama pehnayin aur yeh amli iqdamaat naye dar wa karne ki bunyaad banin ge. un ka moaqqaf tha ke’ ‘ taleem par hamari sarmaya kaari isi waqt sood mand saabit hogi jab hamaray bachay Mashal pakren ge aur is ke sath koi aala kaam kar guzren ge’ ‘
2.title: khalaa aur falkiat ke baray mein aagahi aam karne ke liye koshaan Dubai markaz

news_detail: Arabi Lobaan qabal Maseeh ke waqt se maroof hai. qadeem tahzibon ne is par inhisaar kya jin mein Hazrmout ki mumlikat ke ilawa Moueen , sumudion aur Anbaat ki mamlikatein shaamil hain. Lobaan –apne tibbi fawaid ke sath mazhabi ahmiyat ka bhi haamil hai. Qadeem tibb ilaaj ke mukhtalif nuskhon mein is ka istemaal kya karti thi. un mein baaz nuskhon mein is ka istemaal abhi tak jari hai .

sultanate Oman ke soobay Zaffaar mein waqay pahari silsila, zameen par Lobaan haasil karne ka aik ahem tareen zareya shumaar kya jata hai. Lobaan ka darakht makhsoos maqamat par paaya jata hai. King Saood University mein aasaryaat ke shoba ke asosi at professor dr Ahmed Alabudi ke mutabiq Jazeera Arab ki sarzamen ke har hissa mein khushbuon ko bohat ziyada ahmiyat haasil rahi hai. unhon ne bataya ke ajaaeb khanaay har shakal aur har rang ke dhooni daano se bharay hue hain. yeh dhooni daan pathar, matti aur madniyaat ke banay hue hain. gharon mein dhooniaan Arab Saqafat ka aik ahem tareen juzu hai. har jagah ki tahazeeb ne dhoonion ko mazhabi ya tibbi maqasid ke liye istemaal kya. Lobaan aur deegar dhoonion ki tijarat ke liye istemaal mein anay walay khushki ke mushkil raastoon par aamad o raft ka silsila moqoof ho gaya. un mein bohat se rastay to zahuur islam se qabal hi maand par chuke they. is ke nateeja mein arbo ko aik barray iqtisadi bohraan ka saamna karna para .

Quran e kareem mein bhi un mein se aik mashhoor rastay ka zikar kiya gaya hai. yeh rasta” Ailaf ” ka tha jis ke zariye Quresh ne tijarat ki thi aur yeh islam ke zahuur se qabal Quresh aur mecca walon ki sarwat ka ahem sabab tha. yeh rasta Makkah ko shaam se jorta tha jo mausam garma ka safar hota tha aur Makkah ko Yemen se bhi jorta tha aur yeh mausam sarma ka safar hota tha. jaissa ke Quran e Kareem mein aaya hai ke :” Li-eelafi Quraysh Eelafihim rihlata ashshita-iwassayf ” .

sultanate Oman mein Aala taleem, scienci tahaqeeq aur kharja taluqaat ke shoba ke sarbarah Dr. Ahmed bin Sulaiman Alharasi ne alarabia.net se guftagu mein wazeh kiya ke Lobaan ki 19 aqsam hain jin mein is ke darakht ki 7 nadir aqsam bhi hain. yeh aqsam Yemen , jazeera samatra, Oman ke junoob mein waqay ilaqay Zaffaar , Ethiopia, Sudan, Somalia, jazeera Mid-Ghaskar aur Hindistan mein payi jati hain. Alharasi ke mutabiq ko qadeem zamane se aalmi satah par tavajja aur pazeerai haasil rahi hai. aaj ke daur mein Germany , France , italia aur America mein Lobaan ke hawalay se tahaqeeq jari hai. Alharasi ne bawar karaya ke Lobaan mein qudrati cartizone paaya jata hai. is wajah se yeh tension, asthma aur khansi ke hawalay se behtareen anti biotic hai. is se mukhtalif dawaon ke kipsol bhi tayyar kiye ja rahay hain. Dr. Alharasi ne bataya ke aindah october mein aik aalmi conference ka ineqad ho raha hai jahan Lobaan ke hawalay se aalmi satah par mutadid tajarbaat paish kiye jayen ge
3.title: Lobaan ka qadeem tahzibon se rishta kis noiyat ka?

news_detail: Daur e jadeed mein zaraye hamal o naqal mein is qader jiddat peda ho gayi hai ke urne wali gariyaan ho n ya phir goli ki raftaar se safar karnay wali trinin hon dِnon ka safar ghanton mein aur ghanton ka safar mintun mein tey ho jata hai. France mein bhi ab taiz raftaar tiksyon naay kashtiyon ki jagah le li hai aur darya uboor karne ke liye kashti ki nahi balkay dilchasp design ki taiz raftaar texian service faraham karen gi. si bubble Nami is nanhi sawari ki guzashta roz France ke darya seine par azmaish ki gayi jo nah sirf apni raftaar ki wajah se tavajja ka markaz ban gayi balkay –apne achootay design ke baais bhi dekhnay walon ko heran karti dikhayi di. pani ki satah se kayi inch onche is taxi ko aik nazar dekhnay par maloom hota hai jaisay yeh sun-hwa mein safar kar rahi ho taham yeh mahireen ki anthak mehnat ka kamaal hai ke is water taxi ki shore peda karnay wali awaaz nahin hai balkay mahol dost sawari mein pani mein safar bhi yaqeenan ek allag tajurbah ho ga
4.title: France mein taiz raftaar water texian pani par daudengi gi

news_detail: California : Facebook company yak aisay feature par kaam kar rahi hai jis ki madad se Facebook ke mawaad ko WhatsApp par sirf aik click ke zareya share kya ja sakay ga. bain al aqwami khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq Facebook intizamia aik naya feature’ ‘ WhatsApp par bhejen’ ‘ muta-arif karanay ja rahi hai jis ki madad se Facebook sarfeen –apne pasandeeda mawaad ko WhatsApp par sirf aik click ke zariye share kar saken ge. taham abhi tak is feature ke muta-arif karanay ki hatmi tareekh ka elaan nahi kya gaya hai. tecnology se mutaliq aik ahem Website ny daawa kiya hai ke Facebook kisi mawaad ke share ke option mein aik naye feature send to whatsapp ka izafah kar rahi hai. jisay muntakhib karte hi Facebook ka mawaad WhatsApp mein infiradi ya groups accounts mein share ho jaye ga. is feature ki madad se videos, tasaveer aur tahreerein share ki ja saken gi .

is feature ke muta-arif karaye janay ke baad sarfeen kisi bhi post par ja kar share par click karen ge to teen options write post, share now & send to whatsapp samnay atay hain jaisay hi Sarif ‘ ‘ WhatsApp par bhejen’ ‘ option ka intikhab karen ge to aik link samnay ajatha hai jisay WhatsApp par bheja ja sakta hai. wazeh rahay is se qabal Facebook se WhatsApp par videos aur tasaveer ya post ko barah e raast share nahi karaya ja sakta tha. is maqsad ke liye mawaad ko pehlay down load karna hota tha is ke baad WhatsApp par up load kya ja sakta tha taham ab barah e raast sirf aik click se Facebook mawaad ko WhatsApp par bheja ja sakay ga.
5.title: Ab sirf aik click se Facebook se WhatsApp par post share kijiye

news_detail: Aalmi satah par sab se bara sound system jo matlooba maqam ki munasbat se mozoon hsasit ke sath jadeed tareen mayikrofon ke zareya kaam karta hai taa ke Masjid Haram ke Aima karaam ki talawat aur mouzineen ki pukaar ko logon ki samaaton taq muntaqil kere. jadeed tareen alaat ko behtareen tareeqa se control karne ke liye aala tareen tarbiyat Yafta takneeki amlah poori zmmh daari ke sath –apne faraiz injaam day raha hota hai. is ka maqsad Masjid Haram ka rukh karne walon taq aawaz ko behtareen quality ke sath wazeh tor par pohanchaya jaye .

Masjid Haram mein audio room, audio net work mein istemaal honay wali tknaloji ke hajam ka andaza is amar se lagaya ja sakta hai ke net work mein 4700 aspikrz shaamil hain jo Masjid Haram ki mukhtalif manzlon, hsson, raah daryon ke ilawa haram muki ke atraaf sarkon aur bairooni sahenon se mulhiqa hotlon taq phailay hue hain. Masjid Haram mein electornic works ke shoba ke sarbarah engineer Abdul Aziz Ateeq Alsabhi ke mutabiq” Harm e Makkimein sound system ki courage ko intahi mehfooz tareeqa se poori mustadi ke sath yakeeni banaya jata hai taa ke kisi bhi qisam ke ta-attul aur khlal se bacha ja sakay. is vaastaa bunyadi nizaam ke ilawa rizro aur extra rizro nizaam bhi mojood hotay hain. Allah ke fazl se khalal ka tanasub nah honay ke barabar hai. agar bunyadi nizaam mein khalal peda ho jaye to audio operation mamool ke mutabiq reserve nizaam par muntaqil ho jata hai aur mehsoos bhi nahi hota. yahan taq ke bunyadi nizaam aik martaba phir theek kar diya jata hai. bijli ki farahmi mein Adam ta-attul ko yakeeni bananay ke liye sound system ko Alla darjaa secomac UPS ke sath munsalik kya gaya hai .

engineer Alsabhi ne mazeed bataya ke sound system ke operation aur dekh bhaal ke liye 74 afraad par mushtamil tarbiyat Yafta amlah mojood hai. jin mein technicians, engineers aur nigaran shaamil hain. un ke mutabiq azaan ke waqt se kaafi der pehlay tamam aspikrz ki durusti aur un ke sahih kaam karne ke hawala se itminan kya jata hai taa ke kisi bhi maqam par aawaz ke pounchanay mein koi mushkil paish nah aeye. Alsabhi ke mutabiq mozn ke samnay aik screen hoti hai jis ko doosri tosee mein waqay markazi operation room se control kya jata hai. screen mein aas namaz-e janaza ko zahir kya jata hai jo Masjid Haram mein ada honi hoti hain. audio ahal car namaz e janaza ki noiyat muntakhib karta hai aur phir Sheikh screen mein dikhayi di jany wali maloomat ke mutabiq microphone mein namaz e janaza ki noiyat ka elaan karte hain. Alsabhi ne bawar karaya ke haram muki mein istemaal honay wala sound system intahi Alla quality ka haamil hai taa ke awazon ke yaksaa rehne ko aur aik dosray mein daakhil nah honay ko yakeeni banaya ja sakay. is ke ilawa tamam microphones ko mukammal dekh bhaal ke sath mehfooz jagah par rakha jata hai aur phir namazon ke auqaat mein nikala jata hai. namaz ke baad fori tor par inhen wapas rakh diya jata hai.
Source: alarabiya.net
6.title: Harm e Makki mein duniya ke sab se bade sound system ke baare mein jaaniye!

news_detail: Berlin: Mehanga aur qeemti smart phone haath se chhuut kar girna aik khofnaak lamha hota hai lekin aik 25 sala German taalib ilm nay nihayat kam kharch tareeqa se mehngay phone ko girnay ki soorat mein toot phoot se bachanay wala aik’ air bag’ numa aala tayyar karliya. Germany ki Aalen university mein zair-e taleem Philip Frenzel nay’ AD(active damping) Phone Case’ Nami aik smart nizaam banaya hai jo motion snsr ke tehat kaam karta hai. jaisay hi aap ka phone haath se phisal kar girta hai AD(active damping) Phone Case ka nizaam mutharrak hojata hai aur phone ke charon kinaroon se maiz ki terhan ubhaar nikal atay hain jo phone ko brahِ raast zameen se takaraane se roktay hain. yeh nizaam ain car mein lagey air bag ki terhan kaam karta hai. Philip ko German Society of Mechatronics ki janib se add case par behtareen award diya gaya hai. Philip Frenzel ke mutabiq is mein lagey snsr harkat mehsoos karne mein itnay hassas hain ke haath se mobile girtay hi woh bhaanp letay hain ke ab yeh zameen par hi giray ga. is douran fori tor par charon kono se khaas muray hue plastic ke noke daar tukre nikaltay hain. yeh konay asprng ki madad se andar dabey rehtay hain aur girnay se pehlay bahar nikal atay hain. agarchay add case farokht ke liye dastyab nahi lekin usay media par be hadd saraha gaya hai. fi al haal yeh sahoolat sirf aayi phone ke saaray models ke liye hai lekin Philip usay deegar models ke liye bhi design kar rahay hain. July mein woh is ke liye kِk starter muhim chlakr chandah jama karen ge aur is ke baad hi is ki tijarti tayari samnay aeye gi. Philip nay 3D printer ke zariye is ke tamam hissay banaye hain aur baar baar istemaal karne par is mein bohat kamyabi mili hai. dilchasp baat yeh hai ke is Airbag se phone ki khoubsurti par koi farq nahi padta.
7.title: Qeemti phone girnay par nuqsaan se bachanay wala ‘Mobile Air Bag’ tayyar

news_detail: Aik Amrici digital photography company o camera mikr  ”light”, 5 taa 9 cameron ka haamil smart phone tayyar karne ka mansoobah rakhti hai jo 64 am pi ki tasweer khenchnay ki salahiyat rakhta hai .

saan Francisco : aik Amrici photo graphi company aur camera mikr light, 5 taa 9 cameron ke sath ek prototype smart phone tayyar karne par ghhor kar rahi hai. aqab mein mojood 9 camera hon ge. Amrici akhbar ke mutabiq yeh camera 64 am pi shots tasweer lainay ke qabil hon ge. yeh camera naaqis roshni mein tasweer lainay ke qabil hain. yeh smart phone, aayi phone x se ziyada motai wala nahi hoga jo tasweeron ki yakjai ke liye internal processing ko istemaal kere ga .

camera saaz aur digital photography company’ ‘ light’ ‘ nay elaan kya hai ke woh jald hi aik aisa smart phone paish kere gi jis mein 9 aqbi camera (rare cameras) hon ge jin mein se back waqt 5 se 9 cameron ko tasweer khenchnay ya video bananay mein istemaal kya jasakay ga. company ka daawa hai ke yeh camera 64 mega pixel tak behtareen tasaveer lainay ki salahiyat ke haamil hon ge jab ke kam roshni mein bhi behtareen nataij dainay ke qabil hon ge. yeh phone androoni processing aur khusoosi alogoritham istemaal karte hue mukhtalif tasaveer ko yakja karkay aik wazeh aur intahi saaf suthree tasweer ki shakal mein yakja kere ga. is smart phone mein is ke ilawa bhi bohat se jadeed features mojood hon ge taham jadeed cameron ki wajah se is phone ki qeemat ziyada honay ka imkaan hai. yeh smart phone abhi tayari ke ibtidayi marahil mein hai. is ki launching mein kitna waqt lagey ga? is baray mein company nay koi hatmi tareekh nahi bataaye hai taham rawan saal ke aakhir tak usay market mein laane ka imkaan hai. wazeh rahay ke haal hi mein ”light” company nay 16 cameron wala aik digital kamera ”L16 Hero” paish kya hai jis ki qeemat 1950 dollar hai. yeh digital kamera apne 16 uqbi cameron ki madad se 54 mega pixel jitni zabardast aur tafseeli tasweer kheanch sakta hai. Albata aayndah smart phone is se kahin behtar miyaar ki tasweer sirf 9 uqbi camera istemaal karte hue kheanch sakay ga
8.title: Ab 9 cameron ka haamil smart phone

news_detail: Samaji rabton ki sab se barri aur mashhoor Website ”Facebook” par namaloom Cyber Hackers ke hamla ke baayis 5 crores users ka niji data Leak hojane ka khadsha hai. Executives ney jummay ko kaha ke jin accounts ke hack karliye jaany ka khadsha hai un ki services logged out kar di gayi hai chunkay tehqiqaat jari hain. Yeh cyber hamla Facebook par kiye gaye ab tak ke hamlon mein sab se bada security hamla samjha jaraha hai.Hacker  ya Hackers jin ki tadaad Facebook ko pata nahi hai, zayed az 5 crores users ke accounts tak rasai haasil karne kayi software bugs ka istehsal kya. Iss rasai se mudakhlat kaar ko istemaal kunindgaan ke profiles par ya kisi bhi application par jis par woh Facebook account istemaal karte hue sign in hotay hain, users ki tarha karwai karne ka mauqa mila. Facebook ke maalik Mark Zuckerberg ney kaha hai ke maamla ko bohat sanjeedgi se liya ja raha hai aur is ka hal nikala ja raha hai. Tafseelaat ke mutabiq Facebook hukkaam ka kahna hai ke rawan hafta Company ko iss baat ke isharay miley ke Facebook ke accounts ko hack karne ki koshish ki jarahi aur cyber hamla ke zareya iss ka posheeda code istemaal karkay users ke accounts tak rasai haasil karne ka khatrah hai. Doosri taraf Facebook ke baani Mark Zuckerberg ney kaha ke hum iss maamla ko bohat sanjeedgi se le rahay hain aur is ka hal nikaal rahay hain, Company ki janib se Facebook ke users ke tahaffuz ko yakeeni bananay ke liye poori koshish jari hai jabkay is ke liye thos iqdamaat bhi kiye jarahay hain, itnay khatarnaak maamla ki nishandahi pehlay hi marhala par karli gayi hai aur yeh itminan bakhash baat hai. Mark Zuckerberg ney kaha ke taqreeban 90 million se zayed Facebook users ke accounts logged out karaye gaye jo un ke tahaffuz ke liye zurori tha aur baad tauseeq unhen bahaal kya ja raha hai, hamein un logon ki taraf se musalsal cyber hamlon ka saamna rehta hai jo accounts par qabza kar ke duniya bhar se maloomat chori karna chahtay hain, iss liye bohat zurori hai ke hum mukhtalif tareeqay ikhtiyar karte rahen taakay aisay waqeat runuma hi nah hon. Facebook ney agarchay iss masla par qaboo pa liya hai magar fil-waqt is ke paas ahem sawalaat ke jawabaat nahi hain. Yeh baat abhi tak saaf nahi hui hai ke Hackers ney is rasai se kya haasil kya hai? Aaya unhon ney niji data haasil karliya hai ya phir haqeeqi istemaal kunindgan ki talbees shakhsi ki aur gumraah kun maloomat post kee? Kya yeh intikhabi mudakhlat ki aik aur noiyat toh nahi hai? Zuckerberg ney kaha ke mujhe khushi hai ke hum ney iss ka pata chala liya hai, hasasiat ki nishandahi karli gayi hai aur jin accounts ko khatrah la-haq tha un ko mehfooz kardiya gaya hai, haqeeqat yeh hai ke hamein zaroorat hai ke aisay waqeat ko pehlay hi se roknay ke liye naye tools waza kiye jayen.
9.title: Facebook par cyber hamla, 50 million users ka data leak!
